about.title: About
about.metaDescription: The story behind Bridge Up - a real-time bridge status app for the St. Lawrence Seaway region.
about.heading: The bridge was up.

story.paragraph1: If you live near the Welland Canal, you know the frustration. You're running late, you hit the bridge, and the bridge is up. No idea how long you'll be waiting.
story.paragraph2: The official Seaway website exists, but it's clunky and not something you can safely check while driving. They've been promising a redesign for years. They eventually added Google and Waze integration, but in practice it's slow and unreliable. I wanted something I could actually glance at on CarPlay.
story.paragraph3: So I built Bridge Up. A simple app that tells you if the bridge is open before you get there, and even shows you the boat that's passing through.
story.paragraph4: Bridge Up is a work in progress. Got ideas or feedback? Reach out via

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! Bridge Up is completely free with all features unlocked. No subscriptions, no in-app purchases, no paywalls.
faq.a2: Bridge Up is a passion project. I built it because I was tired of getting stuck at bridges myself. My costs are minimal, so I'd rather make it free and useful for everyone.
faq.a3: Our predictions use 95% confidence intervals based on the 300 most recent closures for each bridge. Most predictions are accurate within a few minutes. Keep in mind it's only an estimate using past closure data as a guide, meaning it can be wildly wrong at times.
faq.a4: Currently Bridge Up is iOS only, with full CarPlay support. Android support is on the roadmap for future development.
